mapper.insert:
insert into steam_items_uu( item_id, `name`, item_name, market_hash_name, short_name, image_url, local_image_url, dura, uu_type_id, uu_weapon_id, bean, created_at )values
( #{item.templateId}, #{item.templateName}, #{item.templateName}, #{item.templateHashName}, #{item.templateName}, #{item.iconUrl}, #{item.iconUrl}, #{item.exteriorName}, #{item.typeId}, #{item.weaponId}, IFNULL(#{item.minSellPrice},0), now() )
